class.name: PLATEAUGmlFileInfo
class.brief_description: Information about a GML file in a PLATEAU dataset.
class.description: PLATEAUGmlFileInfo contains metadata about a specific GML file including its path, mesh code, LOD level, and package type.

members.member: Full path to the GML file.
Mesh code (region ID) for this file.
Maximum LOD level available in this file.
